meanings.sent1: She outkisses her friends by giving them lots of kisses.
meanings.sent2: The puppy outkisses all the other dogs in the park.
meanings.sent3: The little girl always outkisses her teddy bear before bedtime.
meanings.sent4: His love for her outkisses all other emotions.
meanings.sent5: The sun outkisses the moon in brightness.

meanings.definition: To give more kisses than someone else.
meanings.sent1: He outkisses his siblings by showering them with affection.
meanings.sent2: During the game, she outkisses her opponent to show sportsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The cat outkisses the dog in showing love to its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outkisses any material gift.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall outkisses the rain in its display of beauty.
